StringTable.Label: WarAims_BorderSkirmish_Desc
StringTable.String: A short-term war with the intent to preempt aggression and protect borders. Declaring a War of Defense carries minor diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_AggressiveNeighbor]Aggressive Neighbor[/HS]

StringTable.Label: WarAims_WarOfExpansion_Desc
StringTable.String: A moderate-length war with the intent to expand borders and spread influence. Declaring a War of Expansion results in diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_DangerousNeighbor]Dangerous Neighbor[/HS]

StringTable.Label: WarAims_WarOfConquest_Desc
StringTable.String: A long-term war with the intent to claim vast expanses of enemy territory. Declaring a War of Conquest comes with harsher diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_GalacticThreat]Galactic Threat[/HS]

StringTable.Label: WarAims_WarOfAnnihilation_Desc
StringTable.String: A prolonged war with the intent to wipe out the enemy civilization. Declaring a War of Annihilation will carry severe diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_ClearAndPresentDanger]Clear and Present Danger[/HS]

StringTable.Label: WarAction_WonFleetBattle_Desc
StringTable.String: War Aim Points awarded are 10% of the enemy fleet's combat rating

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticMod_AggressiveNeighbor_HSDesc
StringTable.String: A minor reputation gained by declaring a War of Defense that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-1 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticMod_DangerousNeighbor_HSDesc
StringTable.String: A reputation gained by declaring a War of Expansion that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-2 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticMod_GalacticThreat_HSDesc
StringTable.String: A harsh reputation gained by declaring a War of Conquest that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-3 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticMod_ClearAndPresentDanger_HSDesc
StringTable.String: A severe reputation gained by declaring a War of Annihilation that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-4 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]
